overview: Bella is able to merge both of these roles in an explosive portrait of her petite Latina pal, Kristina, whose sassy personality is as irrepressible as her libido. Part documentary, part behind-the-scenes interview and part wall-to-wall hard-core marathon, this epic double-disc release focuses on young Kristina both as a woman and as the insatiably horny fuck slut her fans know and love. The director follows Kristina as she showers, cleans, primps and prepares for an upcoming sex scene. Every aspect of her pre-porn regimen is covered in detail, and in-depth discussions of adorable Kristinas sexual history and desires are totally unfiltered.
title: Kristina Rose: Unfiltered
